modShortDescription: This mod removes from the game the sound effects associated with the auger hitting earth, stone, wood and metal.
modDescription:
This mod removes from the game the [sound](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-sound-mod/) effects associated with the auger hitting earth, stone, wood and metal.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=18aZpucvuSUJ3e18LaD4-UtGY1TF-d4Ye)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/21113-a19-bearable-auger/).

**Credits:** Blitz18
